messages.title: SAM RAHMOUNI YOUR LOCAL LIBERAL DEMOCRAT CANDIDATE
messages.content: Sam Rahmouni has lived here for years and brought up his family here. Sam knows just what our area needs and stood up for Bulmershe & Whitegates in the icy weather. Sam and the Lib Dem team on the council have been campaigning hard to protect our local services and tackling incompetence at the Tory-run council.

messages.title: Four steps to a fairer Britain
messages.content: 1. Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. 2. A fair chance for every child. 3. A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener. 4. A fair deal for you from the politicians

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Both Woodley & Lib Dems fought and won a huge local issue. Their bus was saved.

mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg, Leader of the Liberal Democrats
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two-horse race! Lib Dems vs Conservatives - that's the political battleground in Bulmershe & Whitegates.

issues.governance: Sam and the Lib Dem team on the council have been ... tackling incompetence at the Tory-run council.

leaflet.personalStatement: You can rely on Sam to work for you. Bulmershe & Whitegates needs a councillor who fights our corner. Vote to Fight back this Thursday - join our many strong voices on Reading Borough Council and make a change for Bulmershe & Whitegates.

quotes.text: Lib Dems work hard for you all year round

images.caption: Sam Rahmouni with community members and Liberal Democrat team
